name: Maha Guru Guidance Bhava

name: Param Viewer tar jayen Blessing

name: Awareness of Spiritual Rules Bhava

name: Divine Ecstasy Bhava

name: Cheating Acceptance Bhava

name: Self-Rejection Bhava
